titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I went to the early service, & received the Holy Communion. When I came back to the house, I was met by the news that the Archduke Francis Ferdinand, Heir–Apparent to the Austro–Hungarian throne, had been assassinated in Bosnia together with his wife.

p.hi: We dined at the Castle with Gee, & met the Judge – Sankey – together with many neighbours.
